channel.title: Can't make working shops anymore
channel.description: Hi, After i solved the " all my npcs just started to act like a bank" problem, i just found another one. I cant make anymore shops =\ I did it all the correct way though. I made an npc spawn where i wanted to shop, added new shop to client. And added it in shops.cfg but when i talk to them, nothing happens. When i just copy the old code from another shop to test it out, that wont work either. This is realy freaking me out all my npcs are going crazy *oh noes* Some help please.

item.title: Can't make working shops anymore
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

i know that, i checked that, the npc is the only one using it

Read full topic

item.title: Can't make working shops anymore

item.description:
@zyle269952 wrote:

if you have one npc with 2 shops, like you use the npc twice, it wont work.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't make working shops anymore
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Hi,
After i solved the " all my npcs just started to act like a bank" problem, i just found another one.
I cant make anymore shops =\ I did it all the correct way though. I made an npc spawn where i wanted to shop, added new shop to client.
And added it in shops.cfg but when i talk to them, nothing happens.
When i just copy the old code from another shop to test it out, that wont work either.
This is realy freaking me out all my npcs are going crazy oh noes
Some help please.

Read full topic
